vote.title: Authorize a construction services contract for the Cadillac Heights Park Demolition and Reestablishment Project located at 2924 Cedar Crest Boulevard - Texas Standard Construction Ltd., lowest responsible bidder of six - Not to exceed $748,177.40 - Financing:  Park and Recreation Facilities Fund (2006 General Obligation Bond Fund)
